title: Sea Bass Fillets in Cilantro Sauce
directions: Preheat oven to 350°F. Arrange fish in 13 x 9 x 2-inch glass baking dish; sprinkle with salt and pepper. Puree cilantro, cream, ginger and chili in blender. Add yogurt and just blend in. Season sauce with salt and pepper; spoon over fish.
Bake fish until just opaque in center, about 25 minutes.
